constraints.name: degree_bound
constraints.description: 每个节点的度数必须为偶数，以满足欧拉回路的条件

constraints.name: connectivity
constraints.description: 图必须是连通的，以确保存在欧拉回路

constraints.name: edge_uniqueness
constraints.description: 每条边在路径中只能出现一次
constraints.formal: Each edge (u, v) appears exactly once in the Eulerian tour

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 新增的边不能与已有的边重复
constraints.formal: ∀(c_i, d_i) ∉ E and (c_i, d_i) are distinct
